data.title: Thomas Howard Buckner Obituary 2024
data.meta_description: Thomas (Tom) Buckner passed away peacefully at home on the morning of May 15, 2024.Tom and his wife Stacey lived in Lusby Maryland for almost 30 years. Tom worked as a sheet met...
data.text:
Thomas (Tom) Buckner passed away peacefully at home on the morning of May 15, 2024.

Tom and his wife Stacey lived in Lusby Maryland for almost 30 years.

Tom worked as a sheet metal mechanic for several local companies throughout his career. Tom enjoyed spending time with his family, friends and his many dogs throughout his life.

Tom is survived by his wife Stacey, his grandsons Joshua and Jamie, his brother and sister and numerous other family members.

Tom will be dearly missed by all who had the pleasure of knowing him.
